name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered Notes on Videos - Video Notebook

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Video notetaking powered by OpenAI API on YouTube, Google Meet, Udemy & more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How our extension works:
â–¸ Take timestamped screenshots and notes on videos and meetings. 
â–¸ Add bookmarks inside the video or meeting recording.
â–¸ Automatically generate AI notes whenever you take a screenshot or add a bookmark. The AI note summarizes what the speaker said at that time. 
â–¸ Enable the AI Notes setting to automatically generate notes whenever anything important is said.
â–¸ Enable the AI Slides setting to automatically take screenshots of presenterâ€™s slides during meetings and videos, using computer vision AI.
â–¸ Click on a bookmark's or noteâ€™s timestamp to go back to a point in the video or the meeting recording when you took it.
â–¸ Organize your videos into notebooks.
â–¸ Search across your notes and transcripts.
â–¸ Review your notes in our web app or export them to PDF or markdown. 
â–¸ Share videos along with your screenshots and notes with your friends.

Notetaking on all video platforms finally in one place!

Video Notebook AI note-taker helps you remember more from your videos and meetings. Our bookmarking app can become your personal knowledge center for all your screenshots, slides, text notes, and transcripts!
